description:
Each day at Madison Elementary is dedicated to inspiring each student to extraordinary achievement while providing a safe, positive learning environment. We serve approximately 750 preschool through sixth grade students who speak 23 languages and represent 16 different nationalities.

We are especially proud of our Spanish and English Dual Language Immersion Program. Students begin the program in kindergarten and continue through sixth grade. By developing fluency in two languages, students receive a rich, culturally diverse experience through a rigorous curriculum.Â
